items.title: udev rules for Android (linux) — advisory
items.notes: If missing: create /etc/udev/rules.d/51-android.rules with common vendor IDs, then: sudo udevadm control --reload-rules && sudo udevadm trigger. Unplug/replug device. (This item is advisory; Doctor still passes other checks.)
